dataTemplate.name: BCO_PHYTO_CERTS_BY_DATE
dataTemplate.description: BCO Phyto Certificates by Date Range

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT sref3.shipment_refnum_value loc, phy.phyto_number_xid phyto_id, TO_CHAR(phy.phyto_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') phyto_date, phy.phyto_state, sref1.shipment_refnum_value booking_number, sref2.shipment_refnum_value commodity FROM shipment s INNER JOIN phyto phy ON s.shipment_xid = phy.shipment_id LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON s.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref3 ON s.shipment_gid = sref3.shipment_gid AND sref3.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' WHERE s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND (TO_DATE(phy.phyto_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(phy.phyto_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) ORDER BY sref2.shipment_refnum_value
